programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - January-February - the Year Begins Ep1
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earth’s axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - May-June - a Time of Volatility Ep3
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planet’s most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - November-December - Full Circle Ep6

programme.desc: Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Here Comes the Rain Ep6
programme.desc: Welcome the rains as an emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the sun’s heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnam’s twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal family’s tragedy is another’s holiday dinner as New Zealand’s mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S4) Ep3
programme.desc: Grand Park Rovinj, Croatia - Giles explores a hidden art gallery deep inside the structure and prunes the thousands of plants that frame the view of the old town. Meanwhile, Monica cleans Europe's biggest single glass window, and together they go truffle hunting with dogs in the Istrian landscape.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Cornish king crab is on the menu for Rick as he heads out of Newquay to catch and cook this tasty crustacean. Afterwards, he takes a trip inland to Bodmin Moor to meet Robin Hanbury Tenison, one of the 20th century's last great explorers. His farm is home to one of Cornwall's most ambitious rewilding projects, where Robin's son, Merlin, has recently introduced a pair of wild beavers who are doing their best to restore biodiversity in this corner of Cornwall.

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: It's naked raku week and the remaining potters throw, burnish and fire a pair of vases, and are set a floral challenge by guest judge and flower-making expert Rita Floyd

programme.desc: Brighton and Stockport - In Brighton, George helps Ododu whose downsizing has left her with a kitchen quandary, and in Stockport, can Sarah make her childhood home work for modern family life?

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: The third set of cooks pitch their dish and cookbook ideas to the judges, including using unsung ingredients, recipes designed to combat food waste and dishes inspired by travels.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Following in the footsteps of one of his literary heroes, Rick roams the dramatic north Cornish coast to tell the story of one of Britain's best-loved writers, Thomas Hardy. Another famous writer, Dylan Thomas, dubbed Rick's next stop, Mousehole, as 'the loveliest village in Britain'. It's here that Rick discovers the origins of the iconic Cornish dish stargazy pie.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: From Bean to Bar - Rachel explores chocolate's versatility. She mixes it with savoury in a polpette penne, and in Stockholm she learns about pairing drink with chocolate.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S4) Ep1
programme.desc: Miniature Classics and Strawberries and Cream Sculptures - The teams tackle two miniature classics, Tarte Piémontaise and the Jaffa Cake, and strawberries and cream complete with towering edible showpiece sculptures.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home (S8) Ep2
programme.desc: Brighton and Stockport - In Brighton, George helps Ododu whose downsizing has left her with a kitchen quandary, and in Stockport, can Sarah make her childhood home work for modern family life?

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Donal gives us some superb recipes for a family night in. He shows us Mexican tacos, chocolate biscuit cake, Italian one pan chicken and a shepherd's pie.

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: In this episode Donal shows us how to make a roast veg curry, sticky toffee pudding, Yuk Sun, and a classic roast chicken.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: A Festive Ending - Rachel prepares cold crayfish and serves it with warm crayfish soup and a cheese pie. For dessert, she makes a classic Swedish cheese cake, served warm with whipped cream and jam.

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Family in Sardinia - Gino and his family explore the hidden gems of Eastern Sardinia, lunching on a secluded beach before heading into the mountains.

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Rocco in Naples - Gino and son Rocco head to bustling Naples - they discover incredible street food and Gino cooks up one of his mamma's favourite recipes.

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Luciano in Calabria - Gino and son Luciano travel to rustic Calabria to experience the Italian simple life on a traditional swordfishing boat and on a farm.

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Mia in Northern Sardinia - Gino and daughter Mia head to Gallura in northern Sardinia to discover local traditions and recipes handed down through the generations.

programme.title: Nadiya's Party Feasts (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Nadiya Hussain shares her favourite party dishes. She joins a group of children as they make cupcakes, lends a hand with a trifle and helps out with a birthday cake.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S4) Ep1
programme.desc: Miniature Classics and Strawberries and Cream Sculptures - The teams tackle two miniature classics, Tarte Piémontaise and the Jaffa Cake, and strawberries and cream complete with towering edible showpiece sculptures.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: The third set of cooks pitch their dish and cookbook ideas to the judges, including using unsung ingredients, recipes designed to combat food waste and dishes inspired by travels.

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: In this episode, Donal shows us how to whip up a creamy spinach pasta, spicy shrimp spaghetti, a one pot chicken surprise, and grilled marinated steak.

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Donal shares recipes for dishes including breakfast quesadillas, buffalo spatchcocked chicken, and a crunchy banoffee pie.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: After creating a warm, spicy and aromatic dish of lamb shanks with wide noodles, Nigella turns her attention to very ripe bananas, which she uses to make a gloriously rich and gooey chocolate tahini pudding, and then goes on to create a warming curry with a surprising ingredient.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Future Food Stars (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Gordon sends his contenders back to basics, challenging them to learn traditional salmon-smoking techniques and to forage for ingredients in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S4) Ep2
programme.desc: Cube-Shaped Desserts and an Occasion Showpiece - The teams create magical, cube-shaped desserts that look exactly like mushrooms but taste of anything but, and a heroes and villains-themed occasion showpiece, adorned with 160 macarons.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S19) Ep2
programme.desc: Billinghurst, West Sussex - We join Olaf Mason and Fritha Vincent as they tackle one of the trickiest plots ever seen on the show. Navigating a railway line, busy main road and a sewer, the build became a giant 3D geometrical puzzle.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: After creating a warm, spicy and aromatic dish of lamb shanks with wide noodles, Nigella turns her attention to very ripe bananas, which she uses to make a gloriously rich and gooey chocolate tahini pudding, and then goes on to create a warming curry with a surprising ingredient.

programme.desc: Is There A Doctor In The House? - Two brothers find their connection to a historic night that changed America.

programme.desc: Sleeping On The Job - Anthony Melchiorri dogs an owner to pony-up some money or ship out.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep13
programme.desc: Unsolved Mystereep - When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep29
programme.desc: The Case Of The Silent Parrot - The Pirate Captain is very worried. Scurvy the parrot isn't saying a word. Without him navigating they won't be able to go treasure hunting anymore! Why is Scurvy so quiet? Is there something wrong? Or is he hiding something? It's up to Noddy to investigate!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Ninjas - The Ninjas are preparing for an acrobatics show. But after Pat-Pat decorates them with glitter they don't turn up for their rehearsal. Noddy investigates, looking for the Ninjas, but only finds sticky things have gone missing round Toyland - Pat-Pat's glue-stick, the Naughticorns' sticky tape, the Builders' sticky putty. Noddy works out that the glitter made the Ninjas non sticky, so they borrowed sticky things to try and make themselves sticky again. Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Suitcase - Pat-Pat is packing for a sleepover at the Palace when her suitcase goes missing. Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the Pockets took the suitcase in order to get Pat-Pat's sleepy pillow. They wanted to keep the pillow because it reminds them of Pat-Pat and they would miss her while she was at the sleepover. Noddy finds the Pockets and the suitcase in the dark, just in time for the sleepover. Queen Sparklewings invites everyone to the sleepover. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Two Parties - The Naughticorns are having a party and naturally they want everyone to come. Trouble is, so are the Pirates. But when no one turns up to either party, Noddy investigates: Why has no one come to either party?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa Finds A Voice - Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep5
programme.desc: Zebby'S Snack Time - Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place… but everywhere they try is just too noisy… I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep6
programme.desc: Finding Noisy - Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep29
programme.desc: Homesick Tin Top - Tin Top just can't master corners no matter how hard he tries. The other cars try to help him to no avail… until Roary hits on a brilliant plan.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep30
programme.desc: Save Our Tree - Mr Carburettor is planning on cutting down Flash's tree. What can be done to save the poor rabbit's home?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep31
programme.desc: New Juice - Conrod is visiting Silver Hatch to try out some new bio fuel. But Big Chris fears something is wrong with it after he comes out in spots after sampling a smoothie made from the same produce. What or who could be at fault?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep32
programme.desc: Fb For Football - The cars are having a football tournament down at the beach. FB learns that if he relaxes, his natural footballing skills will shine through.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep15
programme.desc: 2500 Candles For Ra / It'S A Mad Mad Mad Underworld - 2500 Candles for Ra Upset that no one remembered his birthday, Ra goes to hang out with the mummies at the Deedstown museum. It's a Mad, Mad, Mad Underworld When Casper finds Cappy's old treasure map, he promises to help the pirate find his lost fortune.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep16
programme.desc: Curse Of The Sandwich / A Real Little Monster - Curse of the Sandwich After Ra accidentally bites into Thatch's sandwich, he becomes convinced that he's turning into a vampire. Real Little Monster When Norman the bully comes after Jimmy, Casper helps his human friend hide in the one place he knows Norman won't look—Scare School.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep16
programme.desc: Buster Move / Gills! - Smoove Move is embarrassed when his nerdy brother comes to visit.// Skidmark causes a panic when he hunts a snail-eating goldfish at a fancy party.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep16
programme.desc: A Taste Of Crackridge / The Bird And The Bee - Archibald's Souper Stew is a surprise hit with the residents of Crackridge. Archibald and his pal Bea reminisce about how they first met.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep16
programme.desc: P.U. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Harmful Horrors Of The Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep16
programme.desc: Night Of The Hunters Pt 2 - As Hiccup and Snotlout race to rescue the others from Ryker and the Dragon Hunters, they don't realize Dagur and Heather are working with the enemy

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep16
programme.desc: Dragon - Puss vows to slay a dragon that is terrorizing nearby towns, but when he discovers it's a sickly baby dragon, he decides to bring it back home.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep16
programme.desc: Body Double - In preparation for peace talks with the crocodiles, King Julien hires a body double to go in his place.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep16
programme.desc: Meet The Peppy / Party Crash Course - When Peppy invites Branch to go on a Swag Stag hunt, Branch is nervous and invents a tall tale that he must keep up with/DJ Suki confesses that she's nervous to throw a party so Poppy suggests she join the Party Crash Course

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep16
programme.desc: Battering Ram - When parts go missing from the garage, Ace and Skya solve the mystery when they discover D-Structs has a new claw-tail which they put to the test.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Pancake Party - Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Olivia Ep31
programme.desc: Olivia Becomes A Vet - After a trip to the vet with Julian's pet lizard Bernie, Olivia is inspired to become a vet herself. She imagines herself curing all kinds of wild animals, and back home she goes to work on the only two patients available: her pets! Her treatments for Edwin and Perry turn out to be a bit messier than she expected.

programme.title: Olivia Ep32
programme.desc: Olivia Becomes A Chef - It's Mother's birthday, and Olivia's planning something really special: a surprise dinner, with all red food. Imagining she's a famous chef with Dad and Ian as her helpers, the real challenge is keeping mum out of the kitchen while they prepare her special meal.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep31
programme.desc: New Juice - Conrod is visiting Silver Hatch to try out some new bio fuel. But Big Chris fears something is wrong with it after he comes out in spots after sampling a smoothie made from the same produce. What or who could be at fault?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep32
programme.desc: Fb For Football - The cars are having a football tournament down at the beach. FB learns that if he relaxes, his natural footballing skills will shine through.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep16
programme.desc: A Taste Of Crackridge / The Bird And The Bee - Archibald's Souper Stew is a surprise hit with the residents of Crackridge. Archibald and his pal Bea reminisce about how they first met.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep17
programme.desc: The Good Surprise/Nightmare On Eep Street - When Ugga's new surprise attack fails, and she comes home in a bad mood, Thunk tries to cure it by finding a happy surprise for his mom/ Eep stays up all night to see the mysterious and rare Night Mare (a horse with a rainbow mane) when she's teased for thinking they're not real.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Lucky And The Risky Rescue - When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever Ep16
programme.desc: Boy Story / Puzzle, Puzzle, Toil And Trouble - Lotta must infiltrate the Bloogey's treehouse by going undercover and pretending to be a boy. Fredo throws a block-wide puzzle hunt.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep33
programme.desc: The Case Of The Messed-Up Painting - Queen Sparklewings has done a beautiful painting to use in her Story-Time afternoon. But then Coco and Noddy discover it ruined! Coco thinks that Bling must have done it but she protests her innocence. Noddy investigates: who messed up the Queen's painting - and can he get it fixed again in time? Keep investigating, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep34
programme.desc: The Case Of The Deltoid'S Challenge - "Deltoid accepts the Ninja's challenge to run around the loop-theloop. But when he fails on his first attempt, he feels ready to give up in despair. Noddy investigates: How can he help Deltoid do his challenge?"

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep35
programme.desc: The Case Of The Knights On Patrol - The Knights set off on their patrol but are delayed by someone playing tricks on them. Noddy investigates: who's playing tricks on the Knights? He soon finds them in Fable Forest, waylaid by yet another cheeky trick. Noddy will have to find the culprit before the Knights end up in serious trouble!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep36
programme.desc: The Case Of The Delayed Repairs - The railway tracks are being repaired all over Toyland by the Builders, so Farmer Tom, Tractor and a trailer are running a replacement service. But the repairs take longer than expected when the Builders' tools go missing. Noddy investigates, and finds that Cloppycorn loved the trailer rides so much that he hid the biolders' tools in a basket that Pat-Pat had asked him to take to the other Naughticorns. Cloppycorn apologies, the tracks are swiftly repaired, and Cloppycorn happily rides around the farm on the trailer. Well done Noddy !

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep7
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo'S Jungle Drums - Raa Raa has found an infectious beat, and soon all the other animals in the jungle are joining in… except for Ooo Ooo, who just can't get the beat right. How can they find a way for all the friends to play together?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep8
programme.desc: Topsy'S Musical Stones - Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong… especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Buds At First Bite - Baby enlists Goldie's help to show Penny Piranha how to stop biting.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip / Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? // The kids are playing in the garden & make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisõit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep167
programme.desc: The Greedy Gobbler - While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep168
programme.desc: A Longchair for Ron - A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep998
programme.desc: Compilation Special #1 Baby Shark's Big Show: Live from the Shark House - Baby & William are coming to you live in a brand-new special where they'll show you everything they love about Carnivore Cove!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep999
programme.desc: Compilation Special #2 Baby Shark's Big Show: Get Your Game On - Baby & William are putting on a game show and you can play along!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Paddington Finds A Pigeon / Paddington and Chores List - Paddington nurses a sick bird named Pigeonton back to health, but can he let him go? // The family all have chores except Paddington. So as not to be excluded, Mr. Brown creates a list for him to follow, but Paddington picks up the wrong list.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep519
programme.desc: The Treat Thief - Officer Blaze just got his biggest case yet: tracking down the mischievous Treat Thief! With help from Officer Anna, Blaze sets out to stop the thief and recover every stolen treat!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep520
programme.desc: The Race Around the Earth - In their biggest race ever, Blaze and AJ go head-to-head against Crusher to race all the way around the Earth and win the World's Biggest Trophy!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned...

programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure - Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Detectives - Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super Christopher - Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Blue and Little Rainbow Riding Hood - Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort / Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort. // When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Paddington and The Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Paddington Plays Hide And Seek - Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy mus go find her.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Big Rig to the Rescue! - When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep602
programme.desc: The Amazing Stunt Kitty - When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Trials of the Pirate Protector - On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Buds At First Bite - Baby enlists Goldie's help to show Penny Piranha how to stop biting.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Don't Yuck My Yum! - In the Gourmet Galaxy, everyone loves yummy food! But when General Yuck turns everything icky, only a recipe for delicious Moon Muffins can stop her. Master Chef Goby and his apprentice Deema must bake those muffins and save the galaxy!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Mountain Ninja Rescue - Ninjas Zooli and Oona are excited for their first mission: escorting snow monkey Moshi up Mt. Danger to join his troop! But it won't be easy: a storm looms, and mischievous Moshi is causing trouble! Will they complete their mission in time?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep522
programme.desc: Spider's Web - Ew! There's a spider in the house! Mummy Pig tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep175
programme.desc: The Giant Strawberry - When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep176
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Orange Empire - The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Barba TV / The Museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepover / Pups Save the Carnival - Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover. // Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride - Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. // Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Every Cloud/Rainbow Comet Rush - Bobbi wants to spend time with Jade, but there are candy floss clouds to worry about first! // Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: We're toast - The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure - Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Game - Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Don't Yuck My Yum! - In the Gourmet Galaxy, everyone loves yummy food! But when General Yuck turns everything icky, only a recipe for delicious Moon Muffins can stop her. Master Chef Goby and his apprentice Deema must bake those muffins and save the galaxy!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep618
programme.desc: The Fastest of them All - When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Enchanted Melody / Chicken Abuelo - When Escarlata gets ahold of an enchanted guitar riff, all of the underseas may soon fall under her spell. // Tomás accidentally turns Abuelo into a chicken!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Present - Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep715
programme.desc: Pups Save the Marooned Mayors / Pups Save the Game Show - While out ice fishing in the North Country, Mayors Goodway and Humdinger, along with Chickaletta, get stuck in an ice crevasse. // The Wingnuts' farm plays host to a rootin' tootin Game Show hosted by Cowgirl Beryl!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep227
programme.desc: Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2 - The Browns take Paddington to London as a special treat for his birthday but they lose him on the way! // Paddington ends up in the Tower of London & has a close encounter with the Crown Jewels, a Beefeater and a Royal couple!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Fun Fair - The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep34
programme.desc: The Comic Badge - Duggee is reading the Squirrels one of his favourite comics. They eagerly want to know the ending, but the comic was discontinued. Luckily Duggee has the comic badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep35
programme.desc: The Senses Badge - Roly has lost his best potato but Duggee finds it using his sense of smell. But what is a sense? Time for the Squirrels to learn about the five senses and earn their Senses Badge.

programme.desc: Chinese New Year, Dragon Dance Drama - Kyan's invited to perform a dragon dance for Chinese New Year in Beijing. Glitch decides to build a fire breathing dragon robot for the parade and The Go Jetters need to stop it!

programme.desc: The Paddy Fields of China - The Go Jetters swing into action when they discover that Glitch is using real landmarks for his crazy golf course.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep48
programme.desc: Soil - Kit and Pup are gardening. The soil is too hard to dig, so Kit and Pup need to come up with a solution.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Bowl - Dee encourages a friend to say 'bowl' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We explore lots of different types of bowls.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep120
programme.desc: Tiddly Phone - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po receive a call on the Tubby Phone. It's the Tiddlytubbies who ring to say hello, just before the Tubby Phone Dance.

programme.title: Clangers (S2) Ep7
programme.desc: The Disappearing Nest - The Iron Chicken invites the Wols to supper, and goes to fetch some blue string pudding from the Clangers. But when she gets back home, she finds her nest has disappeared!

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: The Things That Went Somewhere - Bob, Gwen and Tony want to get into a shady place to escape the hot sun.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep60
programme.desc: Play Ground Found - The team helps a group of residents to construct a huge playground in their tiny courtyard.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep61
programme.desc: Training Wheels - Tinpo helps Logi-Po to feel part of the team when he can't pull Uni-Board tricks like Doug-Po.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep61
programme.desc: Music Power - Monty investigates how music can make people feel different emotions, after Jeanie tells him that music should have that effect.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep62
programme.desc: You're Never Too Old - Monty is picked on at school for keeping his cuddly toys, and thinks he may be too old for them. This leads him to think about whether people can ever be too old to play.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep63
programme.desc: Fun With Clouds - A family trip for Monty is ruined by the cloudy weather, and they all wish they would disappear, until Monty and Jimmy take another approach.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: I Can't Stop Hiccuping - Lola and Lotta are practising their song for the school concert, but when Lola gets a fit of the hiccups she worries they'll never go away.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep32
programme.desc: Rockpool Rescue - The sun is drying up the water so Nelly and Nora make a rockpool rescue.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep33
programme.desc: Frozen - The pond has frozen over so Nelly and Nora help the ducks find the water again.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep25
programme.desc: Donkey Jump - Sarah & Duck try to help Donkey get his jumping confidence back by building a surprise for him in their back garden.

programme.desc: Rainbow Race - The changeable weather means Rainbow has to leave before finishing his story. Sarah & Duck try to find out how the story ends.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep6
programme.desc: James to the Rescue - It is James' turn to be Sodor's rescue engine. At the Search and Rescue Centre, he eagerly awaits his 'call to action'.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: Dog Loves Drawing - Pug is trying to learn how to draw, and our heroes go on an adventure with a magic pencil. While he is shows them what he can do, he accidentally rubs them out.

programme.desc: The Diplomacy Badge - Betty and Sargent Ant just want perfection, but no one seems to be listening to their shouting! They need a lesson in diplomacy to learn how to speak in a more sensitive way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep37
programme.desc: The Buddy Badge - Duggee hosts a Buddy Bonanza for Mrs Weaver and the Squirrels, with the aim of finding new buddies with common interests to them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep38
programme.desc: The Bridge Badge - It's bridge building time... the squirrels help a quarrelling group of Gerbils sort out their longstanding disagreement.

programme.desc: The Forbidden City, China - Some runaway Chinese drums roll towards The Forbidden City. Can the Go Jetters stop them?

programme.desc: Chinese New Year, Dragon Dance Drama - Kyan's invited to perform a dragon dance for Chinese New Year in Beijing. Glitch decides to build a fire breathing dragon robot for the parade and The Go Jetters need to stop it!

programme.desc: Ameliya's Trinidadian Pepper Roti - Ameliya is cooking roti, a popular food from Trinidad and Tobago filled with carrot, cheese, pepper and spinach. Ameliya also has a Trinidadian surprise for her friends.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep21
programme.desc: Andy and the Snow Leopard - When a fault develops on the remote camera that Jen set up to record sightings of the elusive snow leopard in the Himalayas, it's up to Andy to fix it. Will he succeed?

programme.desc: Cooling Captain Captain - It's sweltering on the Scarlet Squid today so Captain Captain orders her crew to find a way to cool her down. Gem meets her team: Sienna, Mason, Hammam and Melody.

programme.desc: Verrrrry Funny/Pilot's Licence/Roger's Choice/Surprise Party/A Tall Order/A Whale Of Debt/Blind As A Pad/Roger's Gone Whacko - Roger tells Fatou a joke and it’s a really stupid joke because Roger can’t tell it right and it’s really embarrassing for Fatou because she really doesn’t dare tell her friend that he is a terrible joke teller. Still, Roger is aware of his shortcomings and is sorry, he knows he blew it. He would like so much to make Fatou laugh with a good joke, kind of like Igor does. So he decides to take joke-telling lessons with Igor, since Igor is apparently the king of jokes. But it backfires, Roger is still way too serious! But still determined to make Fatou laugh at one of his jokes, the alien decides that science is the solution. He invents a laughter ray which accompanies his jokes and it turns out to work pretty well. In fact so well that Irina, who is inadvertently struck by the ray, can’t stop laughing herself...to the point of endangering her life...!

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Inheritors

programme.desc: Am I Different? [English Subtitles] - Two adults with autism face challenges at work. How well do they manage with their cafe duties and customers? Under the watchful eye of their job coaches, we see them navigating new responsibilities.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Work.Able Ep2
programme.desc: Struggling With Obsessions [English Subtitles] - MIJ teachers have to intervene and help their students tread the fine line in society. Zi Hao's obsession with ATMs gets him arrested whilst Hakim's love for photography lands him in trouble.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Work.Able Ep3
programme.desc: Find Me A Job [English Subtitles] - Unable to get a job for two years, Donnervan enrols into MIJ in the hope of finding where his real interests lie. Graduate Faiz is on the lookout for a new job after several part-time gigs.

programme.title: Headline News
programme.desc: The latest top stories of the hour.

programme.title: To Achieve Happiness Ep1
programme.desc: Health, Wealth & Happiness [English Subtitles] - Wellness is trending but can health & wealth bring true happiness? Journey with presenter Munah Bagharib as she uncovers evidence-based ways to find happiness through wealth, work, rest & health.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Work.Able Ep4
programme.desc: When Dreams Meet Reality [English Subtitles] - Three students with special needs attend a hotel housekeeping workshop for the first time. Shahir steps out of the cafe and tries being a sound engineer in a studio. Who amongst them will shine?

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Work.Able Ep5
programme.desc: I Want To Hire You But... [English Subtitles] - Ashraf's family went through difficult times with his condition while trying to keep MIJ afloat. Three special needs students practice making the bed at a hotel. Faiz finds a new job but will he be able to retain it?

programme.title: Headline News
programme.desc: The latest top stories of the hour.

programme.title: The Baby Makers Ep2
programme.desc: Future Babies [English Subtitles] - Experts predict that one in five babies will be born with some sort of artificial assistance. This episode explores dramatic new developments in fertility science and the booming 'Femtech' market.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep3
programme.desc: Offsiders is back with the Summer Series throughout January. From tennis to cricket, football, basketball and more, Corbin Middlemas and the panel unpack the week's big sporting issues and events both on field and off court.

programme.title: Books That Made Us Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - On the final leg of her literary adventure, Claudia Karvan delves into power and its abuse and misuse in our stories. (Final)

programme.title: Art Works Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - We visit Light at ACMI; meet graphic artist and activist Sam Wallman; go behind-the-scenes with Somebody's Daughter, the theatre company supporting women in and out of prison; plus, Fiona Hall & AJ King's MONA collaboration.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Comedian and artist Anh Do paints controversial, outspoken and passionate athlete, Anthony Mundine. Anthony talks about what drives him and what makes him tick. (Final)

programme.title: ABC News Ep7
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and the day's top stories, with reporters on the ground to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep1
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong presents the week's main world news, as reported by ABC News correspondents based in Bangkok, Beirut, Istanbul, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington. (Return)

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep7
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: Dream Gardens Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - A family revive their tired old garden to complement their new country style home. But can they mitigate the risks from bushfires to create a garden that is both safe and beautiful?

programme.title: ABC National News Ep7
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News brings you round the clock coverage of the latest news and today's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Johanna McDiarmid.

programme.title: Eat Smart Campaign Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A special BBQ episode with Chef Julz making a massive dinner for Farmer Warren and his family, a pig roast with a chilli marinade, herbed potato wedges, tomato rice and vegetable skewers.

programme.title: New Gold Mountain Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - When the charming, but ethically dubious Chinese headman Wei Shing stumbles across a valuable new gold seam, he sets out to enrich himself. But when the body of a murdered European woman turns up, he finds himself implicated.

programme.title: A League Of Her Own
programme.desc: Follow the 2021 Queensland State of Origin Women's team as they strive to achieve the extraordinary in one of the most physically demanding professional sports in Australia.

programme.title: Books That Made Us Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - On the final leg of her literary adventure, Claudia Karvan delves into power and its abuse and misuse in our stories. (Final)
